channel.title: Does anyone
channel.description: Does AnyOne Know like how to do that thing where it says Server will be restarted in 5 minutes, then this timer appears from counting down from 5 minutes. on the left corner of your screen? does any1 know how to do dat!! plzz!! tell me, i would lyk to do it so0 much!!!!!!!!!!!

@pmgzz wrote:

Actually all that was defined in my playerhandler already lol, i just never had a command to start it up, and id dint know u had to put a time when typing in the command, i thought u just typed it in, and it had a preset time. thank you all!!! iLY!!! !rudolph!!! and 0.o Java™!!! o WELls ILY u BOTH!! <3!

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Hmm…

Ooh add this into playerhandler.java if u dont already have it:

if (updateRunning && !updateAnnounced) { str.createFrame(114); str.writeWordBigEndian(updateSeconds*50/30); }

And you add it under this:

private stream updateBlock = new stream(new byte[10000]); // should actually be moved to client.java because it's very client specific public void updatePlayer(Player plr, stream str) { updateBlock.currentOffset = 0;

Oh rofl. I forgot to tell you that most important part too lmao. Yeah, do ::update (then seconds you desire)

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @pmgzz pmgzz
item.description:
@pmgzz wrote:

DUDE ILYYY <3!!!

But i added everything in, strangely the ints were already defined in playerhandler.java

and below where to told me to add if(updateRunning && !updateAnnounced

there were these??

[code] if (updateRunning && System.currentTimeMillis() - updateStartTime > (updateSeconds*1000)) {
kickAllPlayers = true;
server.ShutDown = true;
}

	if (updateRunning && !updateAnnounced) {
		updateAnnounced = true;
	}

	if (updateRunning && System.currentTimeMillis() - updateStartTime > (updateSeconds*1000)) {
		kickAllPlayers = true;
		server.ShutDown = true;
	}[/code]

well im lyk w/e ok. might be for sometin else, then i type in the command but the timer doesn’t show uP??

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Yes I do…open client.java
and add this command with your others:

[code] if ((playerRights >= 2) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“PUT YOUR IN-GAME USERNAME HERE!!!”)) {

		if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}[/code]

Now open playerhandler.java
and add these ints:

public static boolean updateAnnounced; public static boolean updateRunning; public static int updateSeconds; public static long updateStartTime;
Look for this coding:

removePlayer(players[i]); players[i] = null; } else { if(!players[i].initialized) { players[i].initialize(); players[i].initialized = true; } else { players[i].update(); } } }

Below the last bracket ‘}’ add this:

[code] if (updateRunning && !updateAnnounced) {
updateAnnounced = true;
}

	if (updateRunning && System.currentTimeMillis() - updateStartTime > (updateSeconds*1000)) {
		kickAllPlayers = true;
		server.ShutDown = true;
	}[/code]

Now i think that’s all you do…but im not sure because it was already in my server :S Hopefully I helped you at least a little bit.

Read full topic
